attributes.action: encourage local council to spray and/or remove ragwort from grass verges etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if defra can prosecute/and or fine land owners for having ragwort on land then what about the local councils who seem to be cultivating the stuff in grass verges alongside the highways and motorways. it spreads very easily to areas where landowners are struggling to remove it or face possible fines etc.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
